QuestData.Title: Rage Against the Cage
QuestData.Description:
You're looking for a mechanic, are you? Look no further!
I've been toiling on a new necropolis for ages. When Nurakkir collapsed, we saw a golden opportunity! We came to salvage parts from the wreckage, but these brutes locked me up when I criticized their methods.
But now you need help, right? I'm your construct!
You get me out of here, and you've got yourself a new mechanic!
QuestData.LogDescription: Free Ansid the Mechanic from his cage using Toc's key.
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks for the rescue! I owe you one.
